name: Reference - CAR-2021-01-003: Clearing Windows Logs with Wevtutil - MITRE
x_kb_abstract: In an attempt to clear traces after compromising a machine, threat actors often try to clear Windows Event logs. This is often done using “wevtutil”, a legitimate tool provided by Microsoft. This action interferes with event collection and notification, and may lead to a security event going undetected, thereby potentially leading to further compromise of the network.
x_kb_reference_title: CAR-2021-01-003: Clearing Windows Logs with Wevtutil
